text:
Hello everyone !
After a year in the baking, ID Digital is proud to present you our new baby: Mt Buller website!
Mt Buller is a ski resort located in Victoria :flag-au:, just 3 hours away from Melbourne.
We had a soft lunch for the summer website in November, and we just deployed the winter website.
The website is powered by HubSpot CMS, using some custom APIs for the map and the widgets like the weather report or lift status.
CSS is handled by Tailwind. This project was fun and challenging!
Our strategy director wrote an article on medium about the project if you want to see a little behind the scene.
<https://www.mtbuller.com.au/winter>
<https://medium.com/@iddigitalagency/behind-the-scenes-mount-bullers-new-website-how-it-was-made-5d8cabecc606>
